docs.snippet: The $23 billion deal would create one of the world’s largest cellphone providers, with roughly 400 million subscribers in the country.

headline.main: In Battle for Digital India, Vodafone Teams Up With Idea Cellular

docs.snippet: One rental car; two Texas lawmakers, a Democrat and a Republican. Would they survive a 24-hour road trip to Washington?

docs.snippet: Government officials will meet with representatives of U.S. technology firms this week to demand that they do more to help in the fight against terrorism and online hate speech.
